channel.title: Need help with two (2) problems on my server!
channel.description:
Hi, may you please take your time to try and solve my problems... I'm starting to get p-oed about them!
1. I have edited and went through 2 times on editing the NPC talk in NPCHandler.java and after that i save, compile and have even restarted the Runserver.bat thing, when i go on the server it still says the Dialogue it has had before but i go into NPCHandler.java and everything is the same as it was, so I am confused! PLZ HELP
2. I have edited the starting outfit in Player.java, when I save compile, etc... i start a new acc, when i go on there is the original outfit, like i said things arent being transfered, its pissin' me off! But plz help
Thanks for taking your time for reading this! That's it for now, and ANY info would be greatly appreciated!
Thanks again, Axlnosbest1 :)

item.title: Need help with two (2) problems on my server!
item.dc:creator: @axlnosbest1 axlnosbest1
item.description:
@axlnosbest1 wrote:

Well, I think it is but Compiler has worked plenty of other times

item.title: Need help with two (2) problems on my server!

item.description:

Make sure your server code has been successfully compiled.
